"Wandering Chests":
"Wandering Chests are objects which can be unlocked to receive items, at the cost of some of the Exploration Points that you've earned during your current Quest.

The amount of Exploration Points needed to unlock them is relatively low, but they can contain items found in any color of Legacy Chest, so if you're lucky, you can get a very valuable reward for just a few Points."

"If a Wandering Chest is left alone without being unlocked for long enough, it will move to a different location.

You can track Wandering Chests down by using your Mag's Active Sonar. Once one is found, it will appear on your Radar Map."
